Title: Vegetable Pulao
Ingredients: Basmati rice, mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans), onion, spices (cumin, cloves, bay leaf), ginger-garlic paste, salt, oil
Steps: Rinse rice; sauté spices in oil; add onions and ginger-garlic paste; mix vegetables; add rice and water; cook until fluffy.

Title: Chana Masala
Ingredients: Chickpeas (canned or boiled), onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, cilantro
Steps: Sauté onions, garlic and ginger; add spices; stir in tomatoes to form a gravy; add chickpeas and simmer; garnish with cilantro.

Title: Masala Dal
Ingredients: Lentils (toor or masoor), onions, tomatoes, garlic, turmeric, cumin, mustard seeds, dried red chilies, ghee, cilantro
Steps: Cook lentils until soft; sauté onions, tomatoes and spices in ghee; pour tempering over cooked dal; simmer and garnish with cilantro.

Title: DIY Paneer from Milk
Ingredients: Whole milk, lemon juice or vinegar, cheesecloth
Steps: Boil milk; add lemon juice/vinegar to curdle; strain curds through cheesecloth; press to form paneer; refrigerate before use.

Title: Butter Chicken
Ingredients: Chicken pieces, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, yogurt, oil
Steps: Brown chicken; sauté onions, garlic and ginger; add spices and tomatoes; return chicken; simmer with yogurt until tender.

Title: Upma
Ingredients: Semolina (rava), onions, green chilies, mustard seeds, curry leaves, vegetables (peas, carrots), ghee or oil, salt
Steps: Dry roast semolina; sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions and chilies; add vegetables; stir in semolina and water; cook until fluffy.
